articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Poland warns Europe at risk of war as Russia says Ukraine talks hit dead end - Globalnews.ca
articles.description: Russia said it was hitting a dead end as it tried to persuade the West to bar Ukraine from joining NATO and roll back decades of alliance expansion in Europe.
articles.content: Poland’s foreign minister said on Thursday that Europe was closer to war than any time in the last 30 years as Russia gave a bleak assessment of diplomatic efforts this week to defuse tensions over U… [+5355 chars]

articles.title: Munster hand out-half Crowley first European start in Castres trip - The42
articles.description: Head coach Johann van Graan makes five changes for Friday evening’s game at the Stade Pierre-Fabre.
articles.content:
MUNSTER OUT-HALF Jack Crowley has been handed his first European start for tomorrow evenings Heineken Champions Cup trip to Castres Olympique.
